Title: The Other Woman
Plot: Pete asks Joan to make a personal and moral sacrifice to ensure the company lands the Jaguar account. Don becomes furious after learning of the impact Megan's new profession will have on their life. Feeling unappreciated, Peggy attends lunch with Freddy Rumsen, who encourages her to make a move.
GuestStars: Joel Murray, Teyonah Parris, Ben Feldman, Christine Estabrook, Kevin Rahm, Gary Basaraba, Jordan Feldman, Beth Hall, Meghan Bradley, Mark Kelly, Marty Lodge, Brian Elerding
